data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sør-Trøndelag, Norway to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sør-Trøndelag, Norway

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sør-Trøndelag, Norway.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Sør-Trøndelag. Through your servants plant 63 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sør-Trøndelag to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Thai, Isan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Sør-Trøndelag, Norway. Please, stir the 25,269 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, help your children in Sør-Trøndelag, Norway find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Sør-Trøndelag, Norway to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

location.name: Sør-Trøndelag
